attributes.action: Ban Bendy Buses from UK Towns and Cities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The powers that be must have been having a "Mad Moment" when they introduced Bendy Busses to UK Towns and Cities, which over the years have had millions spent on accommodating the ubiquitous Double Decker Bus, The Bendy Bus footprint and steering geometry is totally wrong for British roads, and they carry less pasengers, Get rid of them,

BOB PAPE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
